name: Dash and Cast
description:
My friends and I at Code Junkie Studios put together a sort of run and gun game for the FFS2019 jam. Our ambitions got the best of us, but we had fun trying our best. Thanks so much to Alex, Grogan, Morgan, and Ryan for joining us to help with this jam, means a lot! Controls are wasd/arrowkeys and left click to shoot, right click to dash, scroll to change weapon.

https://yahtzeerage.github.io/Dash-and-Cast-Website/

Some social media outlets of some of our contributors:

https://twitter.com/TheCobaltScarf
